normal.1: Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes using his crossbow and spear.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Mika uses his crossbow to attack, granting nearby active characters in your party Soulwind, which increases their ATK SPD.
description.1: Will take effect in different ways if Tapped or Held.
description.4: Fires a Flowfrost Arrow that can pierce though opponents, dealing <cryo>Cryo DMG</cryo> to enemies it comes into contact with.
description.7: Goes into Aiming Mode, locking on to an opponent and firing a Rimestar Flare at them, dealing <cryo>Cryo DMG</cryo>. When the Rimestar Flare hits, it will rise before exploding, launching Rimestar Shards into a maximum of 3 other opponents, dealing <cryo>Cryo DMG</cryo>.

description.0: Derives the ability to spur his teammates on from the recited prayers of the knightly order, regenerating HP for all nearby party members. This healing is based on Mika's Max HP, and will grant them the Eagleplume state.
description.3: When the Normal Attacks of characters affected by Eagleplume hit an opponent, Mika will help them regenerate HP based on his Max HP.
description.4: Characters affected by this state can only regenerate HP in this way once per short interval of time.
description.6: "Carry hope when in dire straits, and keep vigil when all is well... For that pure white plume shall at last guide the lost wayfarers."

description.0: The Soulwind state caused by Starfrost Swirl will grant characters the Detector effect under the following circumstances and in the following ways, increasing their Physical DMG by 10%.
1: If the Flowfrost Arrow hits more than one opponent, each additional opponent hit will generate 1 Detector stack.
When a Rimestar Shard hits an opponent, it will generate 1 Detector stack. Each Rimestar Shard can trigger the effect 1 time.
description.3: The Soulwind state can have a maximum of 3 Detector stacks, and if Starfrost Swirl is cast again during this duration, the pre-existing Soulwind state and all its Detector stacks will be cleared.

description.0: When a character simultaneously affected by Skyfeather Song's Eagleplume and Starfrost Swirl's Soulwind scores a CRIT Hit with their attacks, Soulwind will grant them 1 stack of Detector from Rapid-Fire Suppression. During a single instance of Eagleplume, 1 Detector stack can be gained in this manner.
description.1: Additionally, the maximum number of stacks that can be gained through Soulwind alone is increased by 1.
description.2: Requires Rapid-Fire Suppression to be unlocked first.

description.0: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Mondstadt on the mini-map.

The Soulwind state of Starfrost Swirl can decrease the healing interval between instances caused by Skyfeather Song's Eagleplume state. This decrease percentage is equal to the ATK SPD increase provided by Soulwind.
When Starfrost Swirl's Flowfrost Arrow first hits an opponent, or its Rimestar Flare hits opponents, 1 Detector stack from Passive Talent "Rapid-Fire Suppression" will be generated.
description.1: You must have unlocked the Passive Talent "Rapid-Fire Suppression" first.

description.0: Increases the Level of Skyfeather Song by 3.

When Mika's own Skyfeather Song's Eagleplume state heal other party members, this will restore 3 Energy to Mika. This form of Energy restoration can occur 5 times during the Eagleplume state created by 1 use of Skyfeather Song.
Increases the Level of Starfrost Swirl by 3.
The maximum number of Detector stacks that Starfrost Swirl's Soulwind can gain is increased by 1. You need to have unlocked the Passive Talent "Rapid-Fire Suppression" first.
description.1: Additionally, characters affected by Soulwind will deal 60% more Physical CRIT DMG.
